var define = widgets.define.bind(widgets,'photoviewer_auto_play_overlay','handlers',['handlers']);
/**
 * @author jwatton
 * @since Dec 11 2017
 */

define(['widget',
        'lib/jquery-amd',
        'photoviewer/models/eventTypes',
        'photoviewer/tracking',
        'photoviewer/radioHelper'],
  function(widget, $, eventTypes, tracking, radioHelper) {
    'use strict';

    var AUTOPLAY_DELAY = 10 * 1000; // 10 seconds
    var autoPlayWidgetContainer = widget.element;
    var m_helper = radioHelper(widget.element, _init, true);
    var m_isVisible = false;

    function _playUpNext() {
      if (m_isVisible) {
        m_isVisible = false;
        $(autoPlayWidgetContainer).toggle(m_isVisible);
        m_helper.getRadio().trigger("autoPlayNext");
      }
    }

    function _cancel() {
      m_isVisible = false;
        $(autoPlayWidgetContainer).toggle(m_isVisible);
      m_helper.getRadio().trigger("cancelAutoPlay");
    }

    function _showOverlay() {
      if (!m_isVisible) {
        m_isVisible = true;
        _setOverlayContent();
          $(autoPlayWidgetContainer).toggle(m_isVisible);
      }
    }

    function _setOverlayContent() {
      var nextVideoTitle = m_helper.getRadio().request("nextVideoTitle");
        var $title = $(".autoPlayOverlayTitle");
        $title.text(nextVideoTitle);

        var $timer = $('.progressIndicator');
        var pathLength = $timer.attr('r') * 2.0 * Math.PI;
        $timer.stop();
        $timer.css('stroke-dasharray', pathLength);
        $timer.css('stroke-dashoffset', pathLength);
        $timer.animate({ 'stroke-dashoffset': 0 }, AUTOPLAY_DELAY, 'linear', _playUpNext);
    }

    //this might be called multiple times - please consider any code added here accordingly
    function _init() {
      m_helper.getRadio().off("showAutoPlayOverlay", _showOverlay).on("showAutoPlayOverlay", _showOverlay);
    }

    return {
      playUpNext: _playUpNext,
      cancel: _cancel
    };
  }
);

});require(['ta/prwidgets'], function(widgets) {
var define = widgets.define.bind(widgets,'photoviewer_report_problem','handlers',['handlers']);
define(["babel/babel-helpers", "widget", "lib/jquery-amd", 'photoviewer/models/eventTypes', 'photoviewer/radioHelper', 'pages/inappropriate_vote_stub', 'photoviewer/tracking', 'page-model'], function (babelHelpers, widget, $, eventTypes, radioHelper, IAP, pvTracking, pageModel) {

  var m_helper = radioHelper(widget.element, _init, true);
  var m_mediaId = void 0;

  //this might be called multiple times - please consider any code added here accordingly
  function _init() {
    m_helper.getRadio().off(eventTypes.HERO_UPDATED, _load).on(eventTypes.HERO_UPDATED, _load);

    m_helper.getRadio().off(eventTypes.HERO_CLICKED, _toggleAnchor).on(eventTypes.HERO_CLICKED, _toggleAnchor);

    m_helper.getRadio().off(eventTypes.RHR_CLICKED, _toggleAnchor).on(eventTypes.RHR_CLICKED, _toggleAnchor);
  }

  function _load(data) {
    if (!(data instanceof Object)) {
      return;
    }
    var mediaid = data.mediaid,
        isPano = data.isPano,
        mediaAttributionUrl = data.mediaAttributionUrl;


    var button = $('.ui_button', widget.element);

    if (isPano || mediaAttributionUrl) {
      if (!button.hasClass('hidden')) {
        // We should only hide the button if it's visible
        button.toggleClass('hidden');
      }
    } else {
      // Make sure that the button is visible
      button.removeClass('hidden');
    }

    m_mediaId = mediaid;
  }

  function _toggleAnchor() {
    $('.ui_button', widget.element).toggleClass('anchor');
  }

  function click(evt) {
    IAP.open(evt, widget.element, { voteContentType: 'MEDIA', contentId: m_mediaId, locationId: pageModel.LOC_ID });
  }

  return {
    click: click
  };
});});require(['ta/prwidgets'], function(widgets) {
var define = widgets.define.bind(widgets,'photoviewer_helpful','handlers',['handlers']);
define(["babel/babel-helpers", "widget", "lib/jquery-amd", 'photoviewer/models/eventTypes', 'photoviewer/radioHelper', 'utils/ajax', 'photoviewer/tracking', 'page-model'], function (babelHelpers, widget, $, eventTypes, radioHelper, ajax, pvTracking, pageModel) {

  var m_helper = radioHelper(widget.element, _init, true);
  var m_curHeroInfo = void 0;
  var m_mediaVoted = {};

  //this might be called multiple times - please consider any code added here accordingly
  function _init() {
    m_helper.getRadio().off(eventTypes.HERO_UPDATED, _load).on(eventTypes.HERO_UPDATED, _load);

    m_helper.getRadio().off(eventTypes.HERO_CLICKED, _toggleAnchor).on(eventTypes.HERO_CLICKED, _toggleAnchor);

    m_helper.getRadio().off(eventTypes.RHR_CLICKED, _toggleAnchor).on(eventTypes.RHR_CLICKED, _toggleAnchor);
  }

  function _load(data) {
    if (!(data instanceof Object)) {
      return;
    }
    var helpfulvotes = data.helpfulvotes,
        mediaid = data.mediaid,
        albumid = data.albumid,
        mediaType = data.mediaType,
        mediaFilter = data.mediaFilter,
        isPano = data.isPano;


    m_curHeroInfo = { helpfulvotes: helpfulvotes, mediaid: mediaid, albumid: albumid, mediaType: mediaType, mediaFilter: mediaFilter };

    $('.ui_button', widget.element).toggleClass('hidden', isPano);

    _updateVotes(helpfulvotes);
  }

  function _toggleAnchor() {
    $('.ui_button', widget.element).toggleClass('anchor');
  }

  function _updateVotes(votes) {
    if (typeof votes !== 'number' || isNaN(votes)) {
      votes = 0;
    }
    if (m_mediaVoted[m_curHeroInfo.mediaid]) {
      votes++;
    }
    $('.count', widget.element).text(votes).toggleClass('hidden', votes &lt;= 0);
    $('.ui_button', widget.element).toggleClass('disabled', m_mediaVoted[m_curHeroInfo.mediaid] === true);
  }

  function _click() {
    if (!m_curHeroInfo || m_mediaVoted[m_curHeroInfo.mediaid]) {
      return;
    }

    // If this function is called from an older mobile servlet, we'll need to use ta.m.secureToken
    var token = '';
    if (window.JS_SECURITY_TOKEN) {
      token = window.JS_SECURITY_TOKEN;
    } else if (ta.m &amp;&amp; ta.m.secureToken) {
      token = ta.m.secureToken;
    }

    ajax({
      url: '/VideoController',
      data: {
        a: 'vt',
        ff: m_curHeroInfo.mediaid,
        vote: 5,
        detail: pageModel.LOC_ID,
        token: token
      }
    });

    m_mediaVoted[m_curHeroInfo.mediaid] = true;

    _updateVotes(m_curHeroInfo.helpfulvotes);
    pvTracking.recordHelpfulClick(m_curHeroInfo.mediaid, m_curHeroInfo.albumid, m_curHeroInfo.mediaFilter, m_curHeroInfo.mediaType);
  }

  return {
    click: _click
  };
});});require(['ta/prwidgets'], function(widgets) {
var define = widgets.define.bind(widgets,'photoviewer_caption','handlers',['handlers']);
define(['babel/babel-helpers', 'widget', 'lib/jquery-amd', 'photoviewer/models/eventTypes', 'utils/ResponsiveEvents', 'utils/responsive', 'photoviewer/radioHelper', 'photoviewer/tracking'], function (babelHelpers, widget, $, eventTypes, responsiveEvents, responsive, radioHelper, tracking) {

  // values from MediaAlbumEntry.java
  var MASK_MEDIA_MANAGEMENT = 1;
  var MASK_MEDIA_TRAVELER = 2;
  var MASK_MEDIA_STAFF = 4;

  var $widget = void 0;
  var $container = void 0;
  var m_helper = radioHelper(widget.element, _init, true);

  //this might be called multiple times - please consider any code added here accordingly
  function _init() {
    $widget = $(widget.element);
    $container = $widget.find('.captionBox');
    _handleResponsive();

    m_helper.getRadio().off(eventTypes.HERO_UPDATED, _load).on(eventTypes.HERO_UPDATED, _load);
  }

  function _load(data) {
    if (!(data instanceof Object)) {
      return;
    }
    var isPano = data.isPano,
        avatarUrl = data.avatarUrl,
        captionText = data.captionText,
        captionProvider = data.captionProvider,
        mediaFilter = data.mediaFilter,
        rating = data.rating,
        reviewUrl = data.reviewUrl,
        mediaAttributionUrl = data.mediaAttributionUrl;


    $container.find('.iconCircle').removeClass('active');

    switch (mediaFilter) {
      case MASK_MEDIA_MANAGEMENT:
        {
          $container.find('.management').addClass('active');
          break;
        }
      case MASK_MEDIA_STAFF:
        {
          $container.find('.tripadvisor').addClass('active');
          break;
        }
      case MASK_MEDIA_TRAVELER:
        {
          $container.find('.avatar').attr('src', avatarUrl);
          $container.find('.user_no_avatar').toggleClass('active', !avatarUrl);
          $container.find('.member').toggleClass('active', !!avatarUrl);
          break;
        }
      default:
        {
          break;
        }
    }

    var captionTitleHtml = captionText;
    $container.find('.ui_bubble_rating').attr('class', 'ui_bubble_rating member bubble_' + rating).toggle(rating &gt; 0);

    var captionProviderContainer = $("&lt;span&gt;&lt;/span&gt;");

    if (mediaAttributionUrl) {
      var attributionLink = $("&lt;a&gt;&lt;/a&gt;").html(captionProvider);
      attributionLink.attr("href", mediaAttributionUrl).attr("target", '_blank').attr("rel", "nofollow");
      attributionLink.click(function (event) {
        event.stopPropagation();
        tracking.recordCaptionAttributionUrlClick();
      });
      captionProviderContainer.append(attributionLink);
    } else {
      captionProviderContainer.text(captionProvider);
    }

    $container.find('.captionBody').toggle(!!captionProvider).html(captionProviderContainer);

    $widget.off('click');
    if (reviewUrl &amp;&amp; reviewUrl.length !== 0 &amp;&amp; !isPano &amp;&amp; captionText &amp;&amp; captionText.length !== 0) {
      captionTitleHtml = $("&lt;a&gt;&lt;/a&gt;").html(captionText);
      captionTitleHtml.attr("href", reviewUrl).attr('target', '_blank').click(function (event) {
        event.stopPropagation();
        tracking.recordCaptionReviewClick();
      });
    }

    var $captionTitle = $container.find('.captionTitle');
    $captionTitle.toggle(!!captionText).html(captionTitleHtml);
  }

  function _handleResponsive() {
    if (responsive.mobile()) {
      _adjustForMobile();
    } else {
      _adjustForDesktop();
    }
    responsiveEvents.onUnder('tablet', _adjustForMobile);
    responsiveEvents.onOver('tablet', _adjustForDesktop);
  }

  function _adjustForDesktop() {
    $container.removeClass('is-mobile');
  }

  function _adjustForMobile() {
    //placement should handle vertical positioning depending on the photo size
    $container.addClass('is-mobile');
  }
});});require(['ta/prwidgets'], function(widgets) {
var define = widgets.define.bind(widgets,'photoviewer_media_filter','handlers',['handlers']);
/**
 *
 * @author kankori
 * @since Nov 2017
 */
define(['widget',
        'lib/jquery-amd',
        'photoviewer/models/eventTypes',
        'photoviewer/tracking',
        'photoviewer/radioHelper',
        'utils/urlutils'],
  function(widget, $, eventTypes, tracking, radioHelper, urlUtils) {
    'use strict';

    var m_helper = radioHelper(widget.element, null, true);
    var $widget = $(widget.element);
    
    function handleTypeClick(event, elm, loadDataQueryParams) {
      var args = urlUtils.getUrlQueryArgs(loadDataQueryParams);
      m_helper.getRadio().trigger(eventTypes.TYPE_CHANGE, args);
      tracking.recordFilterItemClick(args.filter, elm, 'type');
    }
    
    function handleCategoryClick(event, elm, loadDataQueryParams) {
      var args = urlUtils.getUrlQueryArgs(loadDataQueryParams);
      m_helper.getRadio().trigger(eventTypes.CATEGORY_CHANGE, args);
      tracking.recordFilterItemClick(args.albumid, elm, 'category');
    }
    
    function toggleCategoryExpanded(event, elm, numKeepInView) {
      $widget.find('.albumFilterTag').slice(numKeepInView).toggleClass('hidden');
      $widget.find('.expandFilters').toggleClass('hidden');
      $widget.find('.hideFilters').toggleClass('hidden');
    }
    
    return {
      handleTypeClick: handleTypeClick,
      handleCategoryClick: handleCategoryClick,
      toggleCategoryExpanded: toggleCategoryExpanded
    };
  }
);
});require(['ta/prwidgets'], function(widgets) {
var define = widgets.define.bind(widgets,'photoviewer_auto_play','handlers',['handlers']);
/**
 * @author jwatton
 * @since Dec 11 2017
 */

define(['widget',
        'lib/jquery-amd',
        'photoviewer/models/eventTypes',
        'photoviewer/tracking',
        'photoviewer/radioHelper',
        'utils/responsive',
        'overlays/uiOverlay'],
  function(widget, $, eventTypes, tracking, radioHelper, responsive, uiOverlay) {
    'use strict';

    var autoPlayEvent = eventTypes.AUTOPLAY_TOGGLE;
    var $autoplayCheckbox = $(widget.element).find("#AUTOPLAY-SWITCH");
    var m_helper = radioHelper(widget.element, _init, true);
    var m_autoplayEnabled = false;

    /**
     * Set autoplay on or off
     *
     */
    function _toggleAutoplayEnabled() {
      if (m_autoplayEnabled !== $autoplayCheckbox.is(":checked")) {
        m_autoplayEnabled = $autoplayCheckbox.is(":checked");
        if ($autoplayCheckbox.is(":checked")) {
          tracking.trackSimpleAction("autoplay_toggle_on_click");
        } else {
          tracking.trackSimpleAction("autoplay_toggle_off_click");
        }
      }
    }

    /**
     * cancel autoplay from button on overlay
     *
     */
    function _cancelAutoPlayEnabled(){
      m_autoplayEnabled = false;
        $autoplayCheckbox.prop("checked", false);
    }

    /**
     * Check if autoplay is on or off
     *
     * @returns {Boolean}
     */
    function _isAutoplayEnabled() {
      return m_autoplayEnabled;
    }


    /**
     * Opens Overlay info message when hovering over auto play
     */
    function _tooltipHover(event, elmt){
      uiOverlay(event, elmt);
    }


    //this might be called multiple times - please consider any code added here accordingly
    function _init() {
        $autoplayCheckbox.prop('checked', _isAutoplayEnabled() &amp;&amp; responsive.tablet()).change(function() {
        m_helper.getRadio().trigger(autoPlayEvent);
      });
      m_helper.getRadio().off(autoPlayEvent, _toggleAutoplayEnabled).on(autoPlayEvent, _toggleAutoplayEnabled).reply("isAutoPlayEnabled", _isAutoplayEnabled)
        .on("cancelAutoPlay", _cancelAutoPlayEnabled);
    }

    return {
      toolTipHover: _tooltipHover
    };
  }
);});
define('ta/projects', ['vanillajs', 'ns-exporter', 'ta/Core/TA.Store'], function(vanilla, nsExporter, taStore) {
function _hasClass(elt, cname) {
return !!(elt &amp;&amp; cname &amp;&amp; !!elt.className.match(new RegExp('\\b' + cname + '\\b')));
}
var _cache = {
vals: {},
set: function(name, val) {
_cache.vals[name] = val;
},
setIfClass: function(name, elt, cname) {
if (typeof elt == 'string') {
elt = document.getElementById(elt);
}
_cache.vals[name] = _hasClass(elt, cname);
},
get: function(name) {
return _cache.vals[name];
},
has: function(name) {
return name in _cache.vals;
}
};
function _getSimple(name, elt, cname) {
if (!_cache.has(name)) {
_cache.setIfClass(name, elt, cname);
}
return _cache.get(name);
}
var exports = {};
exports.isHotelsRedesign2011 = function() {
var name = 'isHotelsRedesign2011';
if (!_cache.has(name)) {
_cache.setIfClass(name, 'HAC_SMRY', 'hotels_re_2011');
}
return _cache.get(name);
};
exports.isSmartDealsFilters = function() {
return _getSimple('smartDealsFilters', 'DEALS', 'sdfilters');
};
exports.isAttractionsRedesign2012 = function() {
return _getSimple('isAttractionsRedesign2012', 'ATTRACTIONS_2012', 'gridA');
};
exports.isMetaHomepageIntegration2013 = function() {
return _getSimple('isMetaHomepageIntegration2013', 'PPT', 'ppt_container');
};
exports.isMetaHotels2013 = function() {
return _getSimple('isMetaHotels2013', 'PAGE', 'meta_hotels');
};
exports.isMetaHotelsRequest = function() {
return taStore.has('isMetaHotelsRequest');
};
exports.isSmartDealsHSXSortEnabled = function() {
return taStore.has('isSmartDealsHSXSortEnabled');
};
exports.isHRTabs2014 = function() {
return taStore.has('hr_tabs_2014');
};
exports.isTabletAlbumViewer = function() {
return taStore.retrieve('tabletAlbumPhotoLightbox.enabled');
};
exports.isAirport = function() {
return window.pageServlet == "Airport";
};
nsExporter.exportTo(exports, 'ta');
return exports;
});
define('utils/flash', ['ta/util/Error', 'vanillajs'], function (taError, vanilla) {
var _flashver = null,
_getFlashPlayerVersion = function () {
if (!_flashver || !_flashver.loaded) {
try {
_flashver = _detectFlashPlayerVersion();
_flashver.loaded = true;
}
catch (e) {
taError.record(e, "getFlashPlayerVersion: Error trying to fetch flash version");
}
}
if (_flashver) {
return _flashver.major + '.' + _flashver.minor + '.' + _flashver.rev;
}
else {
return '0.0.0';
}
},
_detectFlashPlayerVersion = function () {
var v = [0, 0, 0];
if (navigator.plugins &amp;&amp; navigator.mimeTypes.length) {
var x = navigator.plugins["Shockwave Flash"];
if (x &amp;&amp; x.description) {
v = x.description.replace(/([a-zA-Z]|\s)+/, "").replace(/(\s+r|\s+b[0-9]+)/, ".").split(".");
}
}
else {
var axo = null;
if (navigator.userAgent &amp;&amp; navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Windows CE") &gt;= 0) {
axo = 1;
var vMajor = 3;
while (axo) {
try {
vMajor++;
axo = new ActiveXObject("ShockwaveFlash.ShockwaveFlash." + vMajor);
v = [vMajor, 0, 0];
}
catch (e) {
axo = null;
}
}
}
else {
try {
axo = new ActiveXObject("ShockwaveFlash.ShockwaveFlash.7");
}
catch (e) {
try {
axo = new ActiveXObject("ShockwaveFlash.ShockwaveFlash.6");
v = [6, 0, 21];
axo.AllowScriptAccess = "always";
}
catch (e) {
if (v[0] !== null &amp;&amp; v[0] == 6) {
return v;
}
}
try {
axo = new ActiveXObject("ShockwaveFlash.ShockwaveFlash");
}
catch (e) {
}
}
if (axo !== null) {
try {
v = axo.GetVariable("$version").split(" ")[1].split(",");
}
catch (e) {
}
}
}
}
var fpv = {
major: (v[0] !== null ? v[0] : 0),
minor: (v[1] !== null ? v[1] : 0),
rev: (v[2] !== null ? v[2] : 0)
};
return fpv;
}
return {
getVersion: _getFlashPlayerVersion,
detectVersion: _detectFlashPlayerVersion
}
});
define('cpm/TestSiteResolver', [], function() {
'use strict';
var supportedSites = ['ta.ta.com.s','ta.ta.ca.s','ta.ta.co.uk.s', 'ta.ta.cn.s'];
var defaultTestSite = 'ta.ta.com.test.s'
var exports = {};
function _timeStampFound() {
try {
return window.localStorage &amp;&amp; !!localStorage.getItem('ads.testModeTS');
} catch(e) {
return false;
}
}
function _updateSite(site) {
if (supportedSites.indexOf(site) !== -1) {
site = site.replace(/.s$/, '.test.s');
} else {
site = defaultTestSite;
}
return site;
}
function _updateAdBase(adBase) {
var baseVals = typeof adBase === "string" ? adBase.split("/") : [];
if (baseVals.length &gt; 2 &amp;&amp; baseVals[1] === "5349") {
baseVals[2] = _updateSite(baseVals[2]);
adBase = baseVals.join('/');
}
return adBase;
}
exports.updateAdStubs = function(adStubs) {
if (Array.isArray(adStubs)) {
adStubs.forEach(function(stub) {
stub.base = _updateAdBase(stub.base);
});
}
return adStubs;
};
exports.timeStampFound = _timeStampFound;
exports.updateSite = _updateSite;
exports.updateAdBase = _updateAdBase;
return exports;
});
define('ta/media/player/TA_JWPlayer',
[
'ta',
'lib/jquery-amd',
'utils/ajax',
'ta/Core/TA.Event',
'ta/util/Error',
'ta/Core/TA.Store',
'utils/flash',
'utils/resourceLoader',
'cpm/TestSiteResolver',
'ns-exporter'],
function (
ta,
$,
ajax,
taEvent,
taError,
taStore,
taFlash,
resourceLoader,
testSiteResolver,
nsExporter
) {
"use strict";
var _debug = false;
var _hasAPILoadedOnPage = false;
var _apiInitInProgress = false;
var _apiLoadTimeoutId = null;
var _adClient = 'googima';
var _flashverRequired = {
major: 10,
minor: 0,
rev: 0
};
var _flashver = null;
var _hasMobileStore = !!(ta.m &amp;&amp; ta.m.store);
var _taHas = function (str) {
return _hasMobileStore ? ta.m.store.has(str) : ta.has(str);
},
_taRetrieve = function (str) {
return _hasMobileStore ? ta.m.store.get(str) : taStore.retrieve(str);
},
_taStore = function (str, val) {
return _hasMobileStore ? ta.m.store.add(str, val) : taStore.store(str, val);
},
_getCdn = function (subDir) {
var cdn = window.CDNHOST || "";
return cdn + subDir;
};
var _cdn = _getCdn('/js3/lib/');
var _cdnForAPI = _getCdn('/js3/');
var _api = "build/concat/jwplayer_v7-c.js";
var _flashplayer = "jwplayer7/jwplayer.flash.swf";
var _html5player = "jwplayer7/provider.html5.js";
var _playerSkin = "jwplayer7/skins/glow.css";
var _jwPlayerKey = "nh2hat+tarRNMkESWRU2sRWyEtmC00+lgZPnMg==";
var _timeToEnableAdSkipping = 3;
var _videoPlayCount = 0;
var _adPlayCount = 0;
var _hasVideoCountsLoaded = false;
var _videoCountLoadAttempts = 0;
var _playersOnPageCount = 0;
var Player = function (options) {
var _options = {
timeout: 30000,
playerHeight: 391,
playerWidth: 521,
containerId: null,
videoUrl: null,
previewUrl: null,
mediaId: 0,
locationId: 0,
autostart: false,
aspectratio: null,
closedCaptions: null,
stretching: "bestfit",
mute: false,
initFailureCallback: null,
setupErrorCallback: null,
readyCallback: null,
isLocationPhotoAlbum: false,
disableAds: false,
sponsoredVideo: false,
adMessageText: null,
disableSkipAd: false,
adSkipText: null,
adSkipTimerText: null,
adSkipCallback: null,
};
var _playerId = _playersOnPageCount;
_playersOnPageCount += 1;
if (options.width &amp;&amp; options.aspectratio) {
delete _options.playerHeight;
delete _options.playerWidth;
}
var _status = {
usable: true,
ready: false
};
var _hasPrerollAdStarted = false;
var _hasVideoStarted = false;
logMessage('JWPlayer.initialize');
if (options) {
_options = $.extend(_options, options || {});
logMessage("JWPlayer.initialize: options:", options);
}
_getVideoCountsFromSession();
this.getPlayer = function () {
if (window.jwplayer &amp;&amp; _options.containerId) {
return jwplayer(_options.containerId);
}
return null;
};
this.stop = function () {
if (!_hasAPILoadedOnPage || !_status.usable || !_status.ready || _options.containerId || typeof jwplayer == "undefined") {
return;
}
try {
this.getPlayer().stop();
}
catch (e) {
}
};
this.getState = function () {
if (!_hasAPILoadedOnPage) {
return "UNINITIALIZED";
}
else if (!_status.ready) {
return "UNLOADED";
}
else if (this.getPlayer()) {
try {
return this.getPlayer().getState();
}
catch (e) {
logError(e, "getState exception");
return "ERROR";
}
}
};
this.unload = function () {
try {
if (this.getPlayer() &amp;&amp; typeof this.getPlayer().getState === "function") {
this.getPlayer().stop();
this.getPlayer().remove();
}
}
catch (e) {
logError(e, "error unloading the video player");
}
};
this._loadAPI = function () {
logMessage('_loadAPI: Loading jwplayer API');
if ((typeof jwplayer == "undefined" || !jwplayer) &amp;&amp; !_apiInitInProgress) {
logMessage("_loadAPI: flash plug-in detection: v" + taFlash.getVersion());
_apiInitInProgress = true;
var apiUrl = _cdnForAPI + _api;
try {
logMessage('_loadAPI: loading jwplayer asset: ', apiUrl);
var onLoad = function () {
if (typeof jwplayer == "undefined") {
this._checkAPILoadFailure(false);
}
else {
jwplayer.key = _jwPlayerKey;
_hasAPILoadedOnPage = true;
_apiInitInProgress = false;
logMessage("_loadAPI:" + apiUrl + " loaded");
}
};
resourceLoader.load([apiUrl], onLoad);
}
catch (e) {
logError(e, "_loadAPI: init failure", null, {url: apiUrl});
}
var video = this;
window.setTimeout(function () {
video._checkAPILoadFailure(false);
}, _options.timeout);
}
else {
logMessage("_loadAPI: api already loaded");
_hasAPILoadedOnPage = true;
}
};
this._checkAPILoadFailure = function (bTimeout) {
try {
if (typeof bTimeout == "undefined") {
bTimeout = true;
}
if (!_status.usable) {
return;
}
_apiInitInProgress = false;
if (_apiLoadTimeoutId) {
window.clearTimeout(_apiLoadTimeoutId);
}
if (!_hasAPILoadedOnPage) {
if (window.jwplayer) {
_hasAPILoadedOnPage = true;
jwplayer.key = _jwPlayerKey;
logError(null, "_checkAPILoadFailure found hasAPILoadedOnPage to be false, but API is loaded; Asset.javascript onLoad failed.");
}
else {
_status.usable = false;
var errMsg = "jwplayer javascript api failed to load ";
errMsg += (bTimeout ? "in " + _options.timeout + " ms." : "immediately; bad url possible.");
logError(null, errMsg, null, {url: _cdn + _api});
if (typeof _options.initFailureCallback == "function") {
try {
_options.initFailureCallback();
}
catch (e) {
logError(e, "error while executing onInitFailure");
}
}
else {
logMessage("onInitFailure not set");
}
}
}
else {
logMessage("_checkAPILoadFailure verified API is loaded.");
}
}
catch (e) {
logError(e, "_checkAPILoadFailure exception");
}
};
this.clearVideo = function () {
var vidElem = $('#' + _options.containerId);
vidElem.empty();
if (vidElem.attr('tag') == 'object') {
var parentElem = $('#' + _options.containerId + '_wrapper');
if (parentElem.length) {
parentElem.empty().prop('id', _options.containerId);
return parentElem.get(0);
}
}
return vidElem.get(0);
};
this._getVideoSources = function () {
var hasFlash = _hasRequiredFlashPlayer();
var sources = [];
if (_options.videoFormats) {
_options.videoFormats.forEach(function (format) {
if ((format == ".flv" &amp;&amp; hasFlash) || format == ".mp4" || format == ".webm") {
sources.push({
file: _options.videoUrl + format
});
}
});
}
else if (_options.videoUrl) {
var isFlashSrc = /\.flv$/.test(_options.videoUrl);
if (!isFlashSrc || hasFlash) {
sources.push({
file: _options.videoUrl
});
}
}
logMessage("getSources: Video sources are:");
if (_debug) {
sources.forEach(function (sourceItem) {
logMessage(sourceItem.file);
});
}
return sources;
};
this._isAutoStart = function () {
var autostartOnce = _taHas("jwplayerHelper.preroll.autostartOnce") &amp;&amp; _taRetrieve("jwplayerHelper.preroll.autostartOnce");
var doAutostart = _options.autostart || autostartOnce;
if (autostartOnce) {
_taStore("jwplayerHelper.preroll.autostartOnce", false);
logMessage("Forcing autostart for this pageview");
}
return doAutostart;
};
this.setup = function (count) {
try {
if (count) {
logMessage('setup: recurse');
count += 1;
}
else {
logMessage('setup');
count = 1;
this.stop();
}
if (!_status.usable) {
return;
}
var cntr = document.getElementById(_options.containerId);
if (!cntr) {
logError(null, "JWPlayer.setup: Container element does nt exist on page");
return;
}
if (!_hasAPILoadedOnPage) {
if (!_apiInitInProgress) {
this._loadAPI();
}
if (!_hasAPILoadedOnPage) {
if ((count * 200) &lt; _options.timeout) {
logMessage('setup waiting for api to load...');
var video = this;
_apiLoadTimeoutId = window.setTimeout(function () {
video.setup(count);
}, 200);
}
else {
logError(null, "setup: setTimeout max limit reached");
}
return;
}
}
if (typeof jwplayer == "undefined") {
logError(null, "setup: jwplayer is undefined.");
return;
}
this._setupPlayerOptions();
}
catch (e) {
logError(e, "setup exception");
}
};
this.getContainerId = function () {
return _options.containerId;
};
this.getPlayerId = function () {
return _playerId;
};
this._setupPlayerOptions = function () {
try {
var jwplayerOptions = this._getJwPlayerOptions();
if (!jwplayerOptions) {
return;
}
this.getPlayer().setup(jwplayerOptions);
this._addSetupCallbacks();
this._addAdCallbacks();
this._addPlayCallbacks();
_status.ready = true;
if (isNaN(_options.mediaId)) {
_options.mediaId = 0;
}
if (isNaN(_options.locationId)) {
_options.locationId = 0;
}
}
catch (e) {
logError(e, "_setupPlayerOptions exception");
}
};
this._getJwPlayerOptions = function () {
var videoSources = this._getVideoSources();
if (videoSources.length === 0) {
this._showDefaultVideoPreviewImage();
return null;
}
var jwplayerOptions = {
width: _options.playerWidth,
height: _options.playerHeight,
flashplayer: _cdn + _flashplayer,
html5player: _cdn + _html5player,
skin: {
name: "glow",
url: _cdn + _playerSkin
},
sources: videoSources,
image: _options.previewUrl,
autostart: this._isAutoStart(),
stretching: _options.stretching,
mute: _options.mute
};
if (_options.aspectratio) {
jwplayerOptions.width = "100%";
delete jwplayerOptions.height;
jwplayerOptions.aspectratio = _options.aspectratio;
}
if (_options.closedCaptions) {
jwplayerOptions.captions = _options.closedCaptions;
}
if (this._shouldAdsBeShown()) {
var adDetailsObj = this._getAdDetails();
var companionAdDetails = this._getCompanionAdDetails();
if (adDetailsObj) {
if (companionAdDetails) {
adDetailsObj.companiondiv = companionAdDetails;
}
jwplayerOptions.advertising = adDetailsObj;
jwplayerOptions.primary = "html5";
}
}
return jwplayerOptions;
};
this._stringifyTargeting = function(json) {
var str = '';
for( var key in json ) {
if(str.length) {
str+= '&amp;';
}
if($.inArray(typeof json[key], ["string","number","boolean"]) &gt; -1 || $.isArray(json[key])) {
str+= key + '=' + json[key].toString();
}
}
return encodeURIComponent(str);
};
this._getAdDetails = function () {
var adMessageText = _options.adMessageText ||
_options.rendererOpt.videoWillResume ||
_taRetrieve("jwplayerHelper.localize.videoWillResume") ||
"Your video will resume in xx seconds";
var adSkipText = _options.adSkipText ||
_taRetrieve('jwplayerHelper.localize.skipVideoAd') ||
"Skip";
var adSkipTimerText = _options.adSkipTimerText ||
_options.rendererOpt.skipAdTimerText ||
_taRetrieve("jwplayerHelper.localize.skipAdTimerText") ||
"Skip in xx";
var adUrl = (_options.sponsoredVideo) ?
(_options.rendererOpt.sponsoredVideoAdUrl || _taRetrieve('jwplayerHelper.sponsoredVideoAdUrl')) :
(_options.rendererOpt.adUrl || _taRetrieve('jwplayerHelper.adUrl'));
if (adUrl &amp;&amp; adUrl !== '') {
if (window.localStorage &amp;&amp; localStorage.getItem('ads.testModeTS')) {
var site = adUrl.match(/\/5349\/(.*\.s)\//)[1];
if (site) {
var testSite = testSiteResolver.updateSite(site);
adUrl = adUrl.replace(site, testSite);
}
}
var targetingJSON = _taRetrieve('ads.locationphotoslightbox.pageTargeting') || _taRetrieve('ads.pageTargeting');
if (_options.isLocationPhotoAlbum) {
targetingJSON = _options.rendererOpt.pageTargeting || _taRetrieve('ads.locationphotoalbum.pageTargeting');
}
try {
var rnd = parseInt(Math.random() * 1e5, 10);
adUrl += '&amp;correlator=' + rnd;
if (targetingJSON) {
var sTargeting = this._stringifyTargeting(targetingJSON);
if (sTargeting) {
adUrl += '&amp;cust_params=' + sTargeting;
}
}
var authorString = this._getVideoAuthorString();
if (authorString &amp;&amp; authorString.length) {
adUrl += ';author=' + authorString;
}
adUrl += ';random=' + Math.floor(Math.random()*10000);
} catch (e) {
taError.record(e, "Error building video preroll url");
}
logMessage("_getAdDetails: showing pre-roll: ", adUrl);
var adDetails = {
client: _adClient,
tag: adUrl,
admessage: adMessageText
};
if (!_options.disableSkipAd) {
adDetails.skiptext = adSkipText;
adDetails.skipoffset = _timeToEnableAdSkipping;
adDetails.skipmessage = adSkipTimerText;
}
return adDetails;
}
else {
logMessage("_getAdDetails: no pre-roll ad");
}
};
this._getVideoAuthorString = function () {
var author = 'user';
var videoICaption = _taRetrieve('jwplayerHelper.video.author.icaption');
if (videoICaption) {
videoICaption = videoICaption.toLowerCase();
if (videoICaption.indexOf('association') &gt;= 0) {
author = 'owner';
}
else if (videoICaption.indexOf('professional') &gt;= 0) {
author = 'professional';
}
}
return author;
};
this._showDefaultVideoPreviewImage = function () {
var vidElem = document.getElementById(_options.containerId);
if (vidElem) {
vidElem = this.clearVideo();
}
if (vidElem &amp;&amp; _options.previewUrl) {
$('&lt;img&gt;').attr({
'width': _options.playerWidth,
'height': _options.playerHeight,
'src': _options.previewUrl,
'id': 'photo_error',
'class': 'pageLink',
'style': 'display:block; margin:auto; visibility:visible; '
}).appendTo(vidElem);
if (_taHas("photo.viewer.localization.videoError")) {
$('&lt;div&gt;' + _taRetrieve("photo.viewer.localization.videoError") + '&lt;/div&gt;').attr({
'class': 'videoError',
'style': 'display:block; z-index:2; '
}).appendTo(vidElem);
}
logMessage("setup: no supported video playback, using preview image instead");
}
};
this._getCompanionAdDetails = function () {
var details = { width: 300, height: 250 };
var companion;
if (_options.isLocationPhotoAlbum) {
companion = $('#gpt-ad-300x250-locationphotoalbum');
} else if (window.pageServlet &amp;&amp; window.pageServlet === 'LocationPhotos') {
companion = $('#LOC_PHOTOS .gpt-ad-300x250-300x600');
}
if (companion.length){
details.id = companion.attr('id');
return details;
}
return null;
};
this._addSetupCallbacks = function () {
if (_options.readyCallback &amp;&amp; typeof _options.readyCallback == "function") {
this.getPlayer().on('ready', _options.readyCallback);
}
if (_options.setupErrorCallback &amp;&amp; typeof _options.setupErrorCallback == "function") {
this.getPlayer().on('setupError', _options.setupErrorCallback);
}
};
this._addPlayCallbacks = function () {
var player = this;
if (player.getPlayer()) {
player.getPlayer().on('buffer', function () {
player._logVideoEvents("buffering");
taEvent.fireEvent("videoPlayer_buffer", {playerId: _playerId});
});
player.getPlayer().on('play', function () {
player._logVideoEvents("play");
$(window).trigger('videoPlayer_play');
taEvent.fireEvent("videoPlayer_play", {playerId: _playerId});
if (!_hasVideoStarted) {
_incrementVideoPlayCount();
_hasVideoStarted = true;
}
});
player.getPlayer().on('pause', function () {
player._logVideoEvents("pause");
$(window).trigger('videoPlayer_pause');
taEvent.fireEvent("videoPlayer_pause", {playerId: _playerId});
});
player.getPlayer().on('seek', function () {
player._logVideoEvents("seek");
taEvent.fireEvent("videoPlayer_seek", {playerId: _playerId});
});
player.getPlayer().on('complete', function () {
player._logVideoEvents("complete");
$(window).trigger('videoPlayer_complete');
taEvent.fireEvent("videoPlayer_complete", {playerId: _playerId});
_hasVideoStarted = false;
});
player.getPlayer().on('error', function (event) {
player._logVideoEvents("error");
logError(null, "jwplayer().onError " + event.message, null, event);
player._showDefaultVideoPreviewImage();
});
if (_options.sponsoredVideo) {
player.getPlayer().on('adCompanions', function (event) {
$(window).trigger('videoPlayer_preroll_companions_found', event);
});
}
player.getPlayer().on('fullscreen', function (event) {
if (event.fullscreen) {
player._logVideoEvents("full screen");
$(window).trigger('videoPlayer_enter_fullscreen');
taEvent.fireEvent("videoPlayer_enter_fullscreen", {playerId: _playerId});
}
else {
player._logVideoEvents("normal screen");
$(window).trigger('videoPlayer_exit_fullscreen');
taEvent.fireEvent("videoPlayer_exit_fullscreen", {playerId: _playerId});
}
});
player.getPlayer().on('mute', function () {
var muted = player.getPlayer().getMute();
if (muted) {
$(window).trigger('videoPlayer_audio_off');
taEvent.fireEvent("videoPlayer_audio_off", {playerId: _playerId});
}
else {
$(window).trigger('videoPlayer_audio_on');
taEvent.fireEvent("videoPlayer_audio_on", {playerId: _playerId});
}
});
}
};
this._logVideoEvents = function (action) {
if (!this.getPlayer()) {
return;
}
try {
var params = {
a: action,
b: _options.mediaId,
loc: _options.locationId,
t: this.getPlayer().getPosition(),
a_buffer: this.getPlayer().getBuffer(),
a_duration: this.getPlayer().getDuration(),
flashver: "JWPlayer7.8.1"
};
var player = this;
ajax({
url: '/LogMediaClick',
data: params,
success: function () {
logMessage("logLookbackEvent: /LogMediaClick" +
"?a=" + action +
"&amp;b=" + _options.mediaId +
"&amp;loc=" + _options.locationId +
"&amp;t=" + player.getPlayer().getPosition() +
"&amp;a_buffer=" + player.getPlayer().getBuffer() +
"&amp;a_duration=" + player.getPlayer().getDuration() +
"&amp;flashver=JWPlayer7.8.1");
},
error: function () {
logError(null, "logLookbackEvent failed.");
}
});
}
catch (e) {
logError(e, "logLookbackEvent exception");
}
};
this._addAdCallbacks = function () {
this.getPlayer().on('adComplete', this._onPrerollAdFinished.bind(this));
if (_options.adSkipCallback &amp;&amp; typeof _options.adSkipCallback === "function") {
this.getPlayer().on('adSkipped', _options.adSkipCallback);
}
else {
this.getPlayer().on('adSkipped', this._onPrerollAdFinished.bind(this));
}
this.getPlayer().on('adPlay', this._onPrerollAdPlay.bind(this));
};
this._onPrerollAdPlay = function () {
$(window).trigger('videoPlayer_preroll_start');
var companionAdDetails = this._getCompanionAdDetails();
if (companionAdDetails) {
var companionAd = $('#' + companionAdDetails.id);
companionAd.removeClass('taEmpty');
companionAd.show();
if (!_hasPrerollAdStarted) {
_incrementAdPlayCount();
_hasPrerollAdStarted = true;
}
}
};
this._onPrerollAdFinished = function () {
$(window).trigger('videoPlayer_preroll_end');
var companionAdDetails = this._getCompanionAdDetails();
if (companionAdDetails) {
var companionAdElmt = document.getElementById(companionAdDetails.id);
if (!_hasMobileStore &amp;&amp; companionAdElmt) {
var adArray = [];
adArray.push(companionAdElmt.id);
var adData = {
'isNewContext':true,
'elemIds': adArray
};
taEvent.fireEvent('ads.queueForInjection', adData);
}
}
_hasPrerollAdStarted = false;
};
this._requiresVideoCounts = function () {
if (_options.disableAds) {
logMessage("_requiresVideoCounts: ads disabled in the options");
return false;
}
else if (/test\.s/.test(_taRetrieve('ads.gptBase'))) {
logMessage("_requiresVideoCounts: always show ads for advert");
return false;
}
else if (_taRetrieve("jwplayerHelper.preroll.forceOnce") === true) {
_taStore("jwplayerHelper.preroll.forceOnce", false);
logMessage("_requiresVideoCounts: forcing preroll once");
return false;
}
return true;
};
this._shouldAdsBeShown = function () {
if (_options.disableAds) {
logMessage("_shouldAdsBeShown: ads disabled in the options");
return false;
}
else if (_options.sponsoredVideo) {
return true;
}
else if (/test\.s/.test(_taRetrieve('ads.gptBase'))) {
logMessage("_shouldAdsBeShown: always show ads for advert");
return true;
}
else if (_taRetrieve("jwplayerHelper.preroll.forceOnce") === true) {
_taStore("jwplayerHelper.preroll.forceOnce", false);
logMessage("_shouldAdsBeShown: forcing preroll once");
return true;
}
else if (_hasVideoCountsLoaded) {
if (_adPlayCount &lt; 3 &amp;&amp; _videoPlayCount % 3 === 0) {
logMessage("_shouldAdsBeShown: video count is okay to show ad");
return true;
}
logMessage("_shouldAdsBeShown: video count does not permit to show ad");
}
else {
logMessage("_shouldAdsBeShown: video counts are not loaded. So cannot show ad");
}
return false;
};
};
var logMessage = function (msg, args) {
if (_debug &amp;&amp; console &amp;&amp; console.log) {
if (msg) {
console.log("JWPlayer - " + msg);
}
if (args) {
console.log(args);
}
}
},
logError = function (errObj, msg, evnt, data) {
taError.record(errObj, "JWPlayer - " + msg, evnt, data);
var errStr = (errObj ? errObj.toString() + " " : "");
logMessage(errStr + msg);
},
_hasRequiredFlashPlayer = function () {
try {
if (!_flashver || !_flashver.loaded) {
_flashver = taFlash.detectVersion();
_flashver.loaded = true;
}
return (_flashver &amp;&amp; _flashverRequired &amp;&amp;
_flashver.major &gt;= _flashverRequired.major &amp;&amp;
_flashver.minor &gt;= _flashverRequired.minor &amp;&amp;
_flashver.rev &gt;= _flashverRequired.rev);
}
catch (e) {
taError.record(e, "hasFlashPlayerRequired");
return false;
}
},
_getVideoCountsFromSession = function () {
logMessage("_getVideoCountsFromSession: Trying to get counts from session");
var url = 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/VideoSessionAjax?random=' + Math.floor(Math.random() * 10000);
},
_setVideoCountsInSession = function (videoPlayCount, adPlayCount) {
if (!videoPlayCount) {
videoPlayCount = _videoPlayCount;
}
if (!adPlayCount) {
adPlayCount = _adPlayCount;
}
logMessage("_setVideoCountsInSession: Trying to set video counts in session: Video: " + videoPlayCount + " Ad: " + adPlayCount);
var url = 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/VideoSessionAjax?vpc=' + videoPlayCount + '&amp;vapc=' + adPlayCount + '&amp;random=' + Math.floor(Math.random() * 10000);
},
_incrementAdPlayCount = function () {
logMessage("_incrementAdPlayCount: incrementing ad playcount currently: " + _adPlayCount + " by 1");
_adPlayCount += 1;
_sendVideoCounts();
},
_incrementVideoPlayCount = function () {
logMessage("_incrementVideoPlayCount: incrementing video playcount currently:" + _videoPlayCount + " by 1");
_videoPlayCount += 1;
_sendVideoCounts();
},
_isVideoCountLoadInProgress = function () {
return _videoCountLoadAttempts &gt; 0;
},
_sendVideoCounts = function () {
if (_hasVideoCountsLoaded) {
logMessage("_sendVideoCounts: video counts have loaded. Trying to set the count in session");
_setVideoCountsInSession(_videoPlayCount, _adPlayCount);
}
else if (!_isVideoCountLoadInProgress()) {
logMessage("_sendVideoCounts: video counts have not loaded or in progress. Trying to set the get count from session");
_getVideoCountsFromSession();
}
};
var taJWPlayer = {
createPlayer: function (options) {
var newPlayer = new Player(options);
newPlayer.setup();
return newPlayer;
},
hasRequiredFlashPlayer: _hasRequiredFlashPlayer,
enableDebug: function () {
_debug = true;
},
disableDebug: function () {
_debug = false;
}
};
nsExporter.exportTo(taJWPlayer, 'ta.media.JWPlayer');
return taJWPlayer;
});

define('ta/photos/sponsoredVideo', ['ta', 'lib/jquery-amd', 'utils/ajax', 'ta/util/Error', 'ta/Core/TA.Store', 'ta/Core/TA.Event',
'ta/Core/TA.Record', 'ta/Core/TA.LocalStorage', 'ta/projects', 'utils/flash', 'utils/resourceLoader', 'ns-exporter', 'ta/media/player/TA_JWPlayer'],
function (ta, $, ajax, taError, taStore, taEvent, taRecord, taLocalStorage, taProjects, taFlash, resourceLoader, nsExporter, taJWPlayer) {
"use strict";
var _jwplayer = null,
_initialized = false,
_rendererOpt = {},
_rtl = $(document.body).hasClass('rtl'),
_inventoryAdCallFired = false,
_inventoryAdCallTrigger = 2,
_sponsoredVideoAdHasRun = false,
_sponsoredVideoSecondAdHasRun = false,
_sponsoredVideoCollapserId = 91472856971,
_sponsoredVideoAdId = 'gpt-ad-4x4-a-locationphotoalbum',
_sponsoredVideoCompanionAdId = 'gpt-ad-300x250-locationphotoalbum',
_hasSponsoredVideo = false,
_isRunning = false,
_playStartTime = null,
_playAction = 'play',
_playsInSession = 0,
_enableSkipCountdown = false,
_secondsBeforeSkip = 3,
_maxPlaysPerSession = 2,
_aspectRatioMultiplier = 1.77,
_geoId = parseInt((window.locId || window.modelGeoId || require('page-model').GEO_ID), 10),
_txtSponsoredBy = _rendererOpt.sponsoredBy || taStore.retrieve('sponsoredVideo.localize.sponsoredBy'),
_txtSkipAd = _rendererOpt.skipAd || taStore.retrieve('sponsoredVideo.localize.skipAd'),
_txtYouCanSkipIn3Secs = _rendererOpt.skipAdIn3Secs || taStore.retrieve('sponsoredVideo.localize.skipAdIn3Secs'),
_txtEnableAudio = _rendererOpt.enableAudio || taStore.retrieve('sponsoredVideo.localize.enableAudio'),
_txtNowPlaying = _rendererOpt.nowPlaying || taStore.retrieve('sponsoredVideo.localize.nowPlaying'),
_navArrowHeight = 0,
_galleryClicks = 0,
_playOnGalleryClicks = [5, 20],
_playOnGalleryTablet = [4, 19],
_audioRotateTop = '47%',
_wrapperElemId = 'SPONSORED_VIDEO',
_playerElemId = 'JWPLAYER_SPONSORED_VIDEO',
_positioningElemHTML5 = '.jw-media',
_positioningElemFlash = '.jw-media',
_sponsoredVideoParentSelector = '#LOC_PHOTO_ALBUMS .photoRegion, .photoviewerContainer .photoRegion,#MEDIA_VIEWER_DETAIL_SECTION_CONTAINER',
_galleryItemsToHide = '#LOC_PHOTO_ALBUMS .mainImg, #meta_on_photo_viewer, #LOC_PHOTO_ALBUMS .heroPhoto a.heroNav, #MEDIA_VIEWER_DETAIL_SECTION_CONTAINER .mainImage, ' +
'.photoviewerContainer .mainImg, .photoviewerContainer .heroPhoto .heroNav, #LOC_PHOTO_ALBUMS .bottomBar, #MEDIA_VIEWER_DETAIL_SECTION_CONTAINER .navArrow, ' +
'#LOC_PHOTO_ALBUMS .reviewWrapperOverlay, .photoviewerContainer .bottomBar, .photoviewerContainer .reviewWrapperOverlay, #MEDIA_VIEWER_DETAIL_SECTION_CONTAINER .galleryButton,' +
'[data-prwidget-name="photoviewer_back_to_gallery"], #MEDIA_VIEWER_DETAIL_SECTION_CONTAINER .helpfulReportButtons',
_tabletVideoPlayTriggers = '.heroNav.right.showOnHover, .heroNav.left.showOnHover, .heroThumbnails.showOnHover',
_navArrowsSelector = '.photoRegion .heroNav.right,#MEDIA_VIEWER_DETAIL_SECTION_CONTAINER .navArrow.right',
_hostVideoSrc = (window.MEDIA_HTTP_BASE || 'http://media-cdn.tripadvisor.com/media/') + 'solutions/wrapperVideo',
_hostVideoFormats = ['.mp4', '.flv'],
_hostVideoThumb = (window.CDNHOST || '') + '/img2/photolb/sponsored_video_thumb.jpg',
_hostVideoId = 126862529,
_skipAdButtonDefaultBottomPosition = 50,
_logoDefaultPosition = 15,
_titleDefaultLeftPosition = 35,
_titleDefaultTopPosition = 40,
_prerollCreativeId = null,
_sponsorLogoCompanion = null,
_sponsorLogoResourceWidth = 100,
_companionAdHeight = 250,
_companionAdWidth = 300,
_okToRun = function () {
var okToRun = false;
try {
var parentElem = $(_sponsoredVideoParentSelector);
if (!_isRunning &amp;&amp; _geoId &amp;&amp; parentElem.is(":visible")) {
okToRun = true;
}
} catch (e) {
}
return okToRun;
},
_track = function (action, context, value, bNoninterraction) {
var creativeId = (_prerollCreativeId) ? _prerollCreativeId : 0;
taRecord.trackEventOnPage('pa_spr_vid', action, context, creativeId, bNoninterraction);
},
_getElapsedTime = function () {
var g = 500;
return (_playStartTime) ? Math.floor((new Date().getTime() - _playStartTime) / g) * g : 0;
},
_getPlayerSize = function () {
var playerSize = {
'h': 345,
'w': Math.floor(345 * _aspectRatioMultiplier),
't': '10%'
};
var navArrows = $(_navArrowsSelector);
var tmbStrip = $('#LOC_PHOTO_ALBUMS .heroThumbnails, .photoviewerContainer .heroThumbnails, #MEDIA_VIEWER_DETAIL_SECTION_CONTAINER .mediaStrip');
var parentElem = $(_sponsoredVideoParentSelector);
if (parentElem.length) {
try {
var reserveForNavArrowsW = navArrows.outerHeight() * 2;
var reserveForThumbStripH = tmbStrip.outerHeight();
var availH = parentElem.outerHeight() - reserveForThumbStripH;
var availW = parentElem.outerWidth() - reserveForNavArrowsW;
if (availW / availH &gt;= _aspectRatioMultiplier) {
playerSize.h = availH;
playerSize.w = Math.floor(availH * _aspectRatioMultiplier);
} else {
playerSize.h = Math.floor(availW / _aspectRatioMultiplier);
playerSize.w = availW;
}
playerSize.t = Math.floor((availH - playerSize.h) / 2);
} catch (e) {
taError.record(e, 'sponsored video: unable to determine optimal player size returning default');
}
}
return playerSize;
},
_toggleAudio = function (elem) {
elem.toggleClass('audioOn');
_jwplayer.getPlayer().setMute(!elem.hasClass('audioOn'));
var context = elem.hasClass('audioOn') ? 'tog_on' : 'tog_off';
_track('audio', context, _getElapsedTime(), false);
elem.hide();
},
_createFauxNavArrows = function () {
var wrapperElem = $('#' + _wrapperElemId);
if (wrapperElem.length) {
var thumbRow = $('#LOC_PHOTO_ALBUMS .heroThumbnails, .photoviewerContainer .heroThumbnails');
var posAdj = thumbRow.length ? Math.floor(thumbRow.outerHeight() / 2) : 0;
var heightAdj = _navArrowHeight &gt; 0 ? Math.floor(_navArrowHeight / 2) : 0;
var totalPosAdjust = ( posAdj + heightAdj &gt; 0 ) ? (posAdj + heightAdj) * -1 : 0;
var commonClasses = 'heroNav showOnHover hidden';
var styles = {marginTop: totalPosAdjust + 'px'};
var rgtNav = $('&lt;span class="right"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;').addClass(commonClasses).css(styles).click(_unloadViaNavArrows);
var lftNav = $('&lt;span class="left"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;').addClass(commonClasses).css(styles).click(_unloadViaNavArrows);
if (taProjects.isTabletAlbumViewer()) {
var rgtSvgIconElmt = $('&lt;span class="svgico icon"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;').appendTo(rgtNav);
rgtSvgIconElmt.cloneNode(true).appendTo(lftNav);
}
wrapperElem.append(rgtNav, lftNav);
}
},
_createThumbnailClickArea = function () {
var tmbRow = $('#LOC_PHOTO_ALBUMS .heroThumbnails, .photoviewerContainer .heroThumbnails');
var wrapperElem = $('#' + _wrapperElemId);
if (wrapperElem.length &amp;&amp; tmbRow.length) {
var tmbRowHeight = tmbRow.outerHeight();
$('&lt;div class="tmbListener"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;').css({height: tmbRowHeight + 'px'}).click(_unloadViaThumbnailClick).appendTo(wrapperElem);
} else {
taError.record(null, 'sponsored video: unable to create faux thumbnail layer');
}
},
_sponsoredVideoSkipCounter = function (iter) {
var countElem = $('#SPONSORED_VIDEO .skipSecs');
var skipElem = $('#SPONSORED_VIDEO .skipNow');
if (countElem.length &amp;&amp; skipElem.length) {
if (!iter) {
iter = _enableSkipCountdown ? 0 : _secondsBeforeSkip;
}
if (iter &lt; _secondsBeforeSkip) {
iter++;
var count = countElem.children('.cntDwn');
count.html(_secondsBeforeSkip + 1 - iter);
setTimeout(function () {
_sponsoredVideoSkipCounter(iter);
}, 1000);
}
else {
countElem.hide();
skipElem.show();
_createFauxNavArrows();
_createThumbnailClickArea();
$('#' + _wrapperElemId).addClass('transparent');
}
}
},
_toCSS = function (positionInfo) {
for (var k in positionInfo) {
var elem = positionInfo[k];
for (var pos in elem) {
elem[pos] += 'px';
}
}
return positionInfo;
},
_injectLogoAndVideoSkipControls = function () {
var msgSkipSecs = $('&lt;span class="sprVidMsg skipSecs"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;').text(_txtYouCanSkipIn3Secs);
var skipText = _txtSkipAd + '&amp;nbsp;&lt;em&gt;&amp;rsaquo;&lt;/em&gt;';
var msgSkipNow = $('&lt;span class="sprVidMsg skipNow"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;').html(skipText).click(_unloadViaSkip);
var skipControls = $('&lt;div class="sprVidLayer sprVidSkip"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;').append(msgSkipSecs, msgSkipNow);
var logo = $('&lt;span class="sprVidLabel sprVidLogo"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;');
var logoText = '&amp;thinsp;' + _txtSponsoredBy + '&amp;thinsp;';
$('&lt;span&gt;&lt;/span&gt;').html(logoText).appendTo(logo);
var logoImgUrl = _getSponsorLogoUrl();
if (logoImgUrl) {
$('&lt;img&gt;').prop('src', logoImgUrl).appendTo(logo);
}
var gradient = null;
var titleWrapper = null;
if (_rendererOpt.videoTitle || taStore.retrieve('sponsoredVideo.videoTitle')) {
var videoTitle = _getSponsorVideoTitle();
if (videoTitle) {
titleWrapper = $('&lt;span class="sprVidTitle"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;');
$('&lt;div class="nowPlaying"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;').text(_txtNowPlaying).appendTo(titleWrapper);
$('&lt;div class="videoTitle"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;').text(videoTitle).appendTo(titleWrapper);
gradient = $('&lt;div class="sprVidGradient"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;');
}
}
var positions = _getSkipAdAndLogoPosition();
if (positions &amp;&amp; positions.skipAdPosition) {
skipControls.css(positions.skipAdPosition);
}
if (positions &amp;&amp; positions.logoPosition) {
logo.css(positions.logoPosition);
}
if (positions &amp;&amp; positions.titlePosition &amp;&amp; titleWrapper) {
titleWrapper.css(positions.titlePosition);
}
if (positions &amp;&amp; positions.gradientPosition &amp;&amp; gradient) {
gradient.css(positions.gradientPosition);
}
var wrapperElem = $('#' + _wrapperElemId);
if (wrapperElem.length) {
wrapperElem.append(skipControls, logo);
if (titleWrapper &amp;&amp; gradient) {
wrapperElem.append(gradient, titleWrapper);
setTimeout(function () {
wrapperElem.addClass("noTitle");
}, 5000);
}
}
},
_getSkipAdAndLogoPosition = function () {
var wrapperElmt = $('#' + _wrapperElemId);
var videoWrapper = $(_positioningElemHTML5) || $(_positioningElemFlash);
if (wrapperElmt.length &amp;&amp; videoWrapper.length) {
var skipAdBottomPosValue = 0;
var rightPositionValue = 0;
var videoTop = videoWrapper.offset().top - wrapperElmt.offset().top;
if (videoWrapper.height() + videoTop &lt;= wrapperElmt.height()) {
skipAdBottomPosValue = wrapperElmt.height() - videoTop - videoWrapper.height();
}
if (wrapperElmt.width() &gt; videoWrapper.width()) {
rightPositionValue = Math.floor((wrapperElmt.width() - videoWrapper.width()) / 2);
}
var positionInfo = {
'skipAdPosition': {
'bottom': skipAdBottomPosValue + _skipAdButtonDefaultBottomPosition
},
'logoPosition': {
'top': videoTop + _logoDefaultPosition
},
'titlePosition': {
'top': videoTop + _titleDefaultTopPosition
},
'gradientPosition': {
'top': videoTop,
'bottom': skipAdBottomPosValue,
'left': rightPositionValue,
'right': rightPositionValue
}
};
if (_rtl) {
positionInfo.skipAdPosition.left = rightPositionValue;
positionInfo.logoPosition.left = rightPositionValue + _logoDefaultPosition;
positionInfo.titlePosition.right = rightPositionValue + _titleDefaultLeftPosition;
positionInfo.titlePosition.left = positionInfo.titlePosition.right;
} else {
positionInfo.skipAdPosition.right = rightPositionValue;
positionInfo.logoPosition.right = rightPositionValue + _logoDefaultPosition;
positionInfo.titlePosition.left = rightPositionValue + _titleDefaultLeftPosition;
positionInfo.titlePosition.right = positionInfo.titlePosition.left;
}
return _toCSS(positionInfo);
}
return null;
},
_onResizeFn = function () {
var wrapperId = '#' + _wrapperElemId;
var logoElmt = $(wrapperId + ' .sprVidLabel.sprVidLogo');
var skipAdControls = $(wrapperId + ' .sprVidLayer.sprVidSkip');
var titleWrapper = $(wrapperId + ' .sprVidTitle');
var gradient = $(wrapperId + ' .sprVidGradient');
var player = $(wrapperId + ' .videoPlayer');
var audioBtn = $('.sprVidLayer.sprVidAudio');
var playerSize = _getPlayerSize();
if (taProjects.isTabletAlbumViewer()) {
audioBtn.css('top', _audioRotateTop);
player.css('top', playerSize.t + 'px');
player.css('position', 'relative');
}
var positions = _getSkipAdAndLogoPosition();
if (positions) {
if (positions.skipAdPosition) {
skipAdControls.css(positions.skipAdPosition);
}
if (positions.logoPosition) {
logoElmt.css(positions.logoPosition);
}
if (positions.titlePosition) {
titleWrapper.css(positions.titlePosition);
}
if (positions.gradientPosition) {
gradient.css(positions.gradientPosition);
}
}
},
_getVideoLabel = function () {
return 'video' + _playsInSession;
},
_setCreativeId = function (event) {
_prerollCreativeId = null;
if (event &amp;&amp; event.companions &amp;&amp; event.companions.length) {
try {
var extractIdRegExp = new RegExp(/ta_cid\=(\d+)/);
var includesMarkupRegExp = new RegExp(/(href|HREF)\=["|']/);
for (var i = 0; i &lt; event.companions.length; i++) {
var entry = event.companions[i];
if (entry.height == _companionAdHeight &amp;&amp; entry.width == _companionAdWidth &amp;&amp; entry.resource) {
var companionLink = entry.resource;
if (includesMarkupRegExp.test(companionLink)) {
companionLink = entry.resource.match(/(href|HREF)\=["|']([^",^']+)["|']/)[2];
}
_prerollCreativeId = extractIdRegExp.test(decodeURIComponent(companionLink)) ? decodeURIComponent(companionLink).match(extractIdRegExp)[1] : 0;
break;
}
}
} catch (e) {
taError.record(e, "error setting creative id");
}
}
},
_getSponsorLogoUrl = function () {
var imgUrl = null;
if (_sponsorLogoCompanion &amp;&amp; _sponsorLogoCompanion.resource) {
var imgRegExp = new RegExp(/&lt;img.*?src\=\"(.*?)\"/);
if (imgRegExp.test(_sponsorLogoCompanion.resource)) {
imgUrl = _sponsorLogoCompanion.resource.match(imgRegExp)[1];
}
}
return imgUrl;
},
_getSponsorVideoTitle = function () {
var videoTitle = null;
if (_sponsorLogoCompanion &amp;&amp; _sponsorLogoCompanion.resource) {
var titleRegExp = new RegExp(/adurl\=https?:\/\/www.tripadvisor.com\/(.*?)\"/);
if (titleRegExp.test(_sponsorLogoCompanion.resource)) {
videoTitle = decodeURIComponent(decodeURIComponent(_sponsorLogoCompanion.resource.match(titleRegExp)[1]));
}
}
return videoTitle;
},
_hasPrerollContent = function (event) {
_sponsorLogoCompanion = null;
if (event &amp;&amp; event.companions) {
try {
for (var i = 0; i &lt; event.companions.length; i++) {
var entry = event.companions[i];
if (entry.width == _sponsorLogoResourceWidth) {
_sponsorLogoCompanion = entry;
break;
}
}
} catch (e) {
taError.record(e, "error retrieving logo companion");
}
}
return !!_sponsorLogoCompanion;
},
_onPreRollReady = function (event, companionEvent) {
if (!_hasPrerollContent(companionEvent)) {
return;
}
_setCreativeId(companionEvent);
_playStartTime = Date.now();
_toggleDisplayState(_galleryItemsToHide, false);
$('#' + _wrapperElemId).addClass('videoReady').show();
_injectLogoAndVideoSkipControls();
$(window).on('resize', _onResizeFn);
_sponsoredVideoSkipCounter();
taEvent.on('photoLightBoxHidden', _unloadViaLightboxClose);
var sWhichVideo = _getVideoLabel();
_track(_playAction, sWhichVideo, 0, false);
if (taProjects.isTabletAlbumViewer()) {
$(_tabletVideoPlayTriggers).off('touchstart', _playVideoTablet);
}
var heroVideo = $('.heroPhoto .videoContainer #heroVideo');
if (heroVideo.length) {
heroVideo.get(0).pause();
}
},
_injectMarkup = function () {
var parentElem = $(_sponsoredVideoParentSelector);
var audioMsg = $('&lt;div class="sprVidLayer sprVidAudio"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;').text(_txtEnableAudio);
audioMsg.click(function () {
_toggleAudio(audioMsg);
});
$('&lt;img class="sprVidAudioIcon"&gt;').prop('src', '/img2/x.gif').appendTo(audioMsg);
var playerWrapper = $('&lt;div class="videoPlayer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;');
$('&lt;div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;').prop({
'class': 'jwPlayer',
'id': _playerElemId
}).appendTo(playerWrapper);
$('&lt;div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;').prop({
'id': _wrapperElemId
}).append(audioMsg, playerWrapper).appendTo(parentElem);
},
_initVideoPlayer = function () {
var jwPlayer = $('#SPONSORED_VIDEO .jwPlayer');
var player = $('#SPONSORED_VIDEO .videoPlayer');
if (!jwPlayer.length || !player.length) {
throw new Error('Player objects not defined.');
}
var playerSize = _getPlayerSize();
player.css('top', playerSize.t + 'px');
player.css('position', 'relative');
player.show();
_jwplayer = taJWPlayer.createPlayer({
rendererOpt: _rendererOpt,
containerId: _playerElemId,
playerHeight: playerSize.h,
playerWidth: playerSize.w,
autostart: true,
mute: true,
videoUrl: _hostVideoSrc,
previewUrl: _hostVideoThumb,
mediaId: _hostVideoId,
locationId: _geoId,
videoFormats: _hostVideoFormats,
isLocationPhotoAlbum: true,
initFailureCallback: _onVideoInitFailure,
setupErrorCallback: _onVideoInitFailure,
sponsoredVideo: true,
adMessageText: _rendererOpt.remainingContentSecs || taStore.retrieve('sponsoredVideo.localize.remainingContentSecs'),
disableSkipAd: true,
disableAds: taStore.retrieve('ads.isSponsoredGeo') === true
});
},
_toggleDisplayState = function (aSelectors, bShow) {
$(aSelectors).toggle(bShow);
},
_onVideoInitFailure = function () {
_unloadSponsoredVideo('player failure');
taError.record(null, 'sponsored video: player initialization falure');
},
_playVideoTablet = function () {
if (_jwplayer) {
var player = _jwplayer.getPlayer();
player.play();
}
},
_sponsoredVideoCallback = function(event) {
if (event &amp;&amp; !_sponsoredVideoAdHasRun) {
_sponsoredVideoAdHasRun = true;
_sponsoredVideoAdId == event.slot.getSlotElementId();
if(event.creativeId &amp;&amp; event.creativeId != _sponsoredVideoCollapserId) {
_hasSponsoredVideo = true;
}
}
},
_checkForSponsoredVideo = function() {
if(document.getElementById(_sponsoredVideoAdId)) {
window.googletag = window.googletag || {};
googletag.cmd = googletag.cmd || [];
googletag.cmd.push(function(){
googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded', _sponsoredVideoCallback);
});
var selector = '#' + _sponsoredVideoAdId;
ta &amp;&amp; ta.common &amp;&amp; ta.common.ads &amp;&amp; ta.common.ads.injectAjaxAds('locationphotoalbum', selector, false);
} else {
taError.record(null, 'sponsored video 4x4 ad target not found, sponsored video skipped');
}
},
_handleGalleryThumbClick = function() {
_handleGalleryClick('thumb');
},
_handleGalleryNavClick = function() {
_handleGalleryClick('nav');
},
_handleGalleryClick = function (type) {
if (!_isRunning) {
_galleryClicks++;
if (!_inventoryAdCallFired &amp;&amp; _galleryClicks === _inventoryAdCallTrigger) {
_inventoryAdCallFired = true;
_checkForSponsoredVideo();
}
if (!_sponsoredVideoSecondAdHasRun &amp;&amp; _galleryClicks === _playOnGalleryClicks[1]) {
_sponsoredVideoSecondAdHasRun = true;
ta &amp;&amp; ta.common &amp;&amp; ta.common.ads &amp;&amp; ta.common.ads.injectAjaxAds('locationphotoalbum', '#gpt-ad-4x4-b-locationphotoalbum', false);
}
if (_playOnGalleryTablet.indexOf(_galleryClicks) &gt; -1 &amp;&amp; taProjects.isTabletAlbumViewer()) {
sponsoredVideo.play();
$(_tabletVideoPlayTriggers).on('touchstart', _playVideoTablet);
}
if (!taProjects.isTabletAlbumViewer() &amp;&amp; _playOnGalleryClicks.indexOf(_galleryClicks) &gt; -1) {
sponsoredVideo.play();
}
}
else if(type === 'nav') {
_unloadViaNavArrows();
}
else if(type === 'thumb') {
_unloadViaThumbnailClick();
}
},
_unloadViaNavArrows = function () {
_unloadAndLogPlayTime('navArrows');
$('.heroWrapper .heroPhoto a.heroNav').removeClass('hidden');
},
_unloadViaThumbnailClick = function () {
_unloadAndLogPlayTime('thumbnailClick');
},
_unloadViaSkip = function () {
_unloadAndLogPlayTime('skiplink');
},
_unloadWhenComplete = function () {
_unloadAndLogPlayTime('preroll complete');
},
_unloadNoPreroll = function () {
_unloadSponsoredVideo('no preroll');
},
_unloadViaLightboxClose = function () {
taEvent.off('galThumbClick', _handleGalleryClick);
taEvent.off('galNavClick', _handleGalleryClick);
var logLabel = _isRunning ? 'lightbox_close' : false;
if (logLabel) {
_unloadAndLogPlayTime(logLabel);
} else {
_unloadSponsoredVideo();
}
},
_unloadAndLogPlayTime = function (bLogLabel) {
var refreshAds = false;
if (_isRunning &amp;&amp; _playStartTime !== null) {
var sTimePlayed = _getElapsedTime() + 'ms';
_track('time', sTimePlayed, 0, false);
refreshAds = true;
}
_unloadSponsoredVideo(bLogLabel, refreshAds);
},
_unloadSponsoredVideo = function (bLogLabel, bRefreshAds) {
bRefreshAds = bRefreshAds || false;
if (bLogLabel) {
_track('unload', bLogLabel, _getElapsedTime(), false);
}
_isRunning = false;
_playStartTime = null;
$(window).off('videoPlayer_preroll_companions_found', _onPreRollReady);
$(window).off('videoPlayer_preroll_end', _unloadWhenComplete);
$(window).off('videoPlayer_complete', _unloadNoPreroll);
taEvent.off('photoLightBoxHidden', _unloadViaLightboxClose);
$(window).off('resize', _onResizeFn);
if (_jwplayer) {
try {
var player = _jwplayer.getPlayer();
if (player &amp;&amp; typeof player.getState === "function") {
if (player.getState() === "IDLE") {
player.play();
}
player.pause(true);
player.stop();
}
} catch (e) {
taError.record(e, 'sponsored video: unable to cleanly unload');
}
}
$('#' + _wrapperElemId).remove();
_toggleDisplayState(_galleryItemsToHide, true);
if (_playsInSession &gt;= _maxPlaysPerSession) {
taEvent.off('galThumbClick', _handleGalleryThumbClick);
taEvent.off('galNavClick', _handleGalleryNavClick);
}
if (bRefreshAds) {
$('#' + _sponsoredVideoCompanionAdId).empty();
taEvent.fireEvent('mediaViewerCheckAdRefresh', true);
}
};
var _grabStrings = function() {
_txtSponsoredBy = _rendererOpt.sponsoredBy || taStore.retrieve('sponsoredVideo.localize.sponsoredBy');
_txtSkipAd = _rendererOpt.sprSkipAd || taStore.retrieve('sponsoredVideo.localize.skipAd');
_txtYouCanSkipIn3Secs = _rendererOpt.skipAdIn3Secs || taStore.retrieve('sponsoredVideo.localize.skipAdIn3Secs');
_txtEnableAudio = _rendererOpt.enableAudio || taStore.retrieve('sponsoredVideo.localize.enableAudio');
_txtNowPlaying = _rendererOpt.nowPlaying || taStore.retrieve('sponsoredVideo.localize.nowPlaying');
};
var sponsoredVideo = {
init: function (initOpts) {
_rendererOpt = initOpts || {};
_galleryClicks = 0;
if (!_initialized) {
_playsInSession = parseInt(taLocalStorage.getSessionKey('sponsoredVideoPlays'), 10) || 0;
var sprVidCSS = _rendererOpt.photoAlbumSponsoredVideoCSS || taStore.retrieve('photoAlbumSponsoredVideoCSS');
if (!sprVidCSS) {
taError.record(null, 'sponsored video cancelled: required CSS not found');
_unloadSponsoredVideo('missing required CSS');
return;
}
if (_playsInSession &lt; _maxPlaysPerSession) {
resourceLoader.load(sprVidCSS, {forceType: 'css'});
taEvent.on('galThumbClick', _handleGalleryThumbClick);
taEvent.on('galNavClick', _handleGalleryNavClick);
}
_navArrowHeight = $('.heroWrapper .heroPhoto a.heroNav').height();
_grabStrings();
_initialized = true;
}
},
play: function () {
if (_okToRun()) {
if (!_hasSponsoredVideo &amp;&amp; !(_rendererOpt.controlLogging || taStore.has('sponsoredVideo.controlLogging'))) {
_unloadSponsoredVideo('no preroll available');
return;
}
if (_playsInSession &lt; _maxPlaysPerSession) {
_playsInSession++;
taLocalStorage.setSessionKey('sponsoredVideoPlays', _playsInSession);
if (_rendererOpt.controlLogging || taStore.has('sponsoredVideo.controlLogging')) {
var sWhichVideo = _getVideoLabel();
taRecord.trackEventOnPage('pa_spr_vid_control', _playAction, sWhichVideo, 0, false);
return;
}
_isRunning = true;
try {
_injectMarkup();
_initVideoPlayer();
} catch (e) {
_unloadSponsoredVideo('load error');
taError.record(e, "sponsored video: unable to inject markup and initialize player");
}
$(window).on('videoPlayer_preroll_companions_found', _onPreRollReady);
$(window).on('videoPlayer_preroll_end', _unloadWhenComplete);
$(window).on('videoPlayer_complete', _unloadNoPreroll);
} else {
_unloadSponsoredVideo();
}
} else {
_unloadSponsoredVideo('unsupported context');
}
}
};
nsExporter.exportTo(sponsoredVideo, 'ta.photos.sponsoredVideo');
return sponsoredVideo;
});
require(['ta/prwidgets'], function(widgets) {
var define = widgets.define.bind(widgets,'photoviewer_sponsored_video','handlers',['handlers']);

    videoTitle: videotitle,

  };

  sponsoredVideo.init(opt);
});});require(['ta/prwidgets'], function(widgets) {
var define = widgets.define.bind(widgets,'photoviewer_media_filter_toolbar','handlers',['handlers']);
/**
 * @author kankori
 * @since Nov 2017
 */
define(['widget',
        'lib/jquery-amd',
        'photoviewer/models/eventTypes',
        'photoviewer/tracking',
        'photoviewer/radioHelper',
        'utils/urlutils',
        'ta/prwidgets'],
  function(widget, $, eventTypes, tracking, radioHelper, urlutils, prwidgets) {
  'use strict';
  
  var events = [eventTypes.TYPE_CHANGE, eventTypes.CATEGORY_CHANGE].join(' ');

  var dropdownItemSelected = false;
  var overlays = {};
  var $widget = $(widget.element);
  var m_helper = radioHelper(widget.element, _init, true);

  function _showOverlay(overlayName, contentSelector) {
    if(!overlays[overlayName]) {
      require(['overlays/Overlay',
        'overlays/position/fullside',
        'overlays/styles/windowshade',
        'overlays/options/keepInDom',
        'overlays/styles/modal',
        'overlays/options/closeOnWindowshadeClick',
        'overlays/options/slideInOut'
      ], function (Overlay, fullside, windowShade, keepInDom, Modal, closeOnWindowshadeClick, slide) {
        var content = $widget.find(contentSelector);
        overlays[overlayName] = new Overlay(widget.element,
          fullside.right(),
          new Modal(null, null, 'second-layer', null, null, content.get(0)),
          windowShade('dark second-layer'),
          slide('from_right'),
          closeOnWindowshadeClick);
        prwidgets.initWidgets(overlays[overlayName].contentElement);
        overlays[overlayName].show();
        // HOT-21959 - ru-Ru: MW: Can't scroll the filter category of photos
        $(overlays[overlayName].container).addClass('layered_overlay');
        overlays[overlayName].on('hide', function() {
          if (!dropdownItemSelected) {
            var pageAction = overlayName === "typeOverlay" ? "grid_view_type_click" : "grid_view_category_click";
            tracking.recordGridDropdownAbandonment(pageAction);
          }
          dropdownItemSelected = false;
        });
      });
    } else {
      overlays[overlayName].show();
    }
  }
  
  function _showTypeOverlay() {
    _showOverlay('typeOverlay', '.type_flyout');
  }
  
  function _showCategoryOverlay() {
    _showOverlay('categoryOverlay', '.category_flyout');
  }
  
  function _clearOverlays() {
    for (var ol in overlays) {
      if (overlays.hasOwnProperty(ol)) {
        overlays[ol].destroy();
        delete overlays[ol]; //will need to re-create after reload
      }
    }
    dropdownItemSelected = true;
  }
  
  function _typeClicked(event, target, data) {
    var args = urlutils.getUrlQueryArgs(data);
    m_helper.getRadio().trigger(eventTypes.TYPE_CHANGE, args);
    tracking.recordFilterItemClick(args.filter, target, 'type');
  }
  
  function _categoryClicked(event, target, data) {
    var args = urlutils.getUrlQueryArgs(data);
    m_helper.getRadio().trigger(eventTypes.CATEGORY_CHANGE, args);
    tracking.recordFilterItemClick(args.albumid, target, 'category');
  }
  
  //this might be called multiple times - please consider any code added here accordingly
  function _init() {
    m_helper.getRadio().off(events, _clearOverlays).on(events, _clearOverlays);
  }
  
  return {
    showTypeOverlay: _showTypeOverlay,
    showCategoryOverlay: _showCategoryOverlay,
    typeClicked: _typeClicked,
    categoryClicked: _categoryClicked
  };
});
});require(['ta/p13n/placements'], function(placements) {
var define = placements.define.bind(placements,'ab_chk','handlers',['handlers']);
/*
 * ADS-3472: ad blocker detection running permanently on sales drs 99
 * Works in Chrome, Firefox, Safari &amp; IE.

define(["placement","cpm/AdBlockDetect"], function(placement,abDetect) {

  abDetect.runIfDetected(function(){}, "ab_chk", true);
